casebody.data:
STATE of Louisiana
v.
Samuel ANDERSON a/k/a Samuel Brent Anderson No. 2018-K-90 Supreme Court of Louisiana. June 1, 2018 ON WRIT OF CERTIORARI TO THE COURT OF APPEAL, THIRD CIRCUIT, PARISH OF EVANGELINE Writ denied. HUGHES, J., would grant in part and assigns reasons. Hughes, J., would grant the writ in part.

Respectfully, in my opinion, "I wish I had a lawyer" is enough.
